CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Banks'), 'Banks', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Neobanks'), 'Banks', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Acquirers'), 'Payments', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'ATM Networks'), 'Payments', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'BNPL'), 'Payments', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Fintech and Lending'), 'Payments', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Payment Service Provider'), 'Payments', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Wallets'), 'Payments', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Delivery Program'), 'Retail', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Food & Beverage'), 'Retail', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Marketplace'), 'Retail', IF( ISPICKVAL(Industry, 'Retail'), 'Retail', TEXT(Industry) ))))))))))))
CustomField.label: IVA Vertical
